title: How do I reject a call using the Bluetooth headset?
answer:
If you receive an incoming call when the TalkBand B2 is connected to your phone using Bluetooth:

1. If the Bluetooth headset is in the strap, press and hold the side button of the TalkBand B2 to reject the call or press the side button to stop the vibration of B2.

2. If the Bluetooth headset is removed from the strap, press the side button to answer the call (press again to end the call) or press and hold the side button to reject the call.
